com.guardtime.container.hash

Interface HashAlgorithmProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SingleHashAlgorithmProvider

    public interface HashAlgorithmProvider
    Helper that contains a selection of HashAlgorithms that are to be used for producing DataHashes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.guardtime.ksi.hashing.HashAlgorithm getAnnotationDataReferenceHashAlgorithm()
      Returns a HashAlgorithm to be used for creating DataHash for AnnotationDataReference.
      List<com.guardtime.ksi.hashing.HashAlgorithm> getDocumentReferenceHashAlgorithms()
      Returns a List of all HashAlgorithms to be used for creating DataHashes for FileReference used specifically for ContainerDocuments.
      List<com.guardtime.ksi.hashing.HashAlgorithm> getFileReferenceHashAlgorithms()
      Returns a List of all HashAlgorithms to be used for creating DataHashes for FileReference.
      com.guardtime.ksi.hashing.HashAlgorithm getSigningHashAlgorithm()
      Returns a HashAlgorithm to be used when creating signature for the container.

    • Method Detail
